\section{Exams}


\subsection{2013}


\subsubsection{Overview of subjects}
\begin{itemize}
\item Task 1

\begin{itemize}
\item Business Model Canvas
\item AT-ONE \textbf{Actors} model with a Value Network Model
\item AT-ONE \textbf{Touchpoint} model with a Service Journey Model
\item AT-ONE \textbf{Offerings} model with a Service Contract Model
\item AT-ONE \textbf{Needs }model with a Goal Model
\item User Stories, Use Case Model, Use Case description
\end{itemize}
\item Task 2

\begin{itemize}
\item Information model with UML
\item Process model with BPMN
\item System architecture with a SoaML model
\end{itemize}
\item Task 3

\begin{itemize}
\item Metamodel for CLoudML, described as an EMF compliant UML model
\item Describe creating a graphical editor CloudML using EMF with Eugenia/GMF
\end{itemize}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{2012}


\subsubsection{Overview of subjects}
\begin{itemize}
\item Task 1

\begin{itemize}
\item Business Process Model using BPMN
\item Value Network Model using Value Networks
\item Requirements Model using UML Use Case approach
\item Service Model using SoaML
\end{itemize}
\item Task 2

\begin{itemize}
\item Metamodel for Value Network Models
\item Transformation/mapping rules
\end{itemize}
\item Task 3

\begin{itemize}
\item Discussion around Model Based System development vs Agile development
\end{itemize}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{2011}


\subsubsection{Overview of subjects}
\begin{itemize}
\item Task 1

\begin{itemize}
\item Business Model with BPMN
\item Requirements model with relevsant Use Cases
\item Service Model with SoaML
\end{itemize}
\item Task 2

\begin{itemize}
\item Metamodel for SoaML model created in previous task
\item Transformation/mapping rules
\end{itemize}
\item Task 3

\begin{itemize}
\item ADM to migrate an already existing implementation to Cloud-based technology
\end{itemize}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{2010}


\subsubsection{Overview of subjects}
\begin{itemize}
\item Task 1

\begin{itemize}
\item SoaML models for Service Architecture/Collaboration and Component/Compostite
\item Describe behaviour for the SoaML model of the illustrated process
using BPMN
\end{itemize}
\item Task 2

\begin{itemize}
\item Simplified Metamodel for the core part of BPMN in the previous question
\item BPEL execution engine (Business Process Execution Language)

\begin{itemize}
\item Transformation rules with MOFScript (MOF2Text)
\item Mapping from BPMN to BPEL
\end{itemize}
\end{itemize}
\item Task 3

\begin{itemize}
\item Semantic web service technologies and principles from Model Driven
Interopability\end{itemize}
\end{itemize}
